component.name: Museum-Metadata-Embedder
component.summary: Graphic User Interface for bulk adding exif, xmp and iptc data to images using VRA Core, ISAD-G & Dublin Core standards

description.p: Museum-Metadata-Embedder is a python3/tkinter/pysimplegui Windows/Linux/MacOS graphical frontend for bulk adding exif, xmp and iptc data to images using VRA Core, ISAD-G & Dublin Core standards
